trans-unit.source: Defines events that are raised by <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 对象引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> requests child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 请求子节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle this event to add child nodes to a node.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件以将子节点添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> is about to be disposed.
trans-unit.target: 在即将释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> is initialized.
Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> requests shortcut menu items.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 请求快捷菜单项时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle this event to add a shortcut menu item to a node.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件以向节点添加快捷菜单项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)。
在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 请求属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle this event to add a property to a node.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件以将属性添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: The property appears in the **Properties** window when the node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 属性将显示在**属性**窗口时选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)。
